alert.note: Alert for Orange; Putnam; Westchester (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 07 at 9:01PM EST until March 07 at 10:00PM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Upton NY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fairfield County in southern Connecticut... Northern Westchester County in southeastern New York... Northeastern Orange County in southeastern New York... Putnam County in southeastern New York... * Until 1000 PM EST. * At 901 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Goshen, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Newburgh and West Point around 915 PM EST. Peekskill around 920 PM EST. Fahnestock State Park around 925 PM EST. Mahopac and Lake Carmel around 930 PM EST. Brewster around 935 PM EST. New Canaan and Ridgefield around 945 PM EST. Wilton and Weston around 950 PM EST. Monroe around 1000 PM EST. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
